Anyone know why i cannot post in SGExams? Post gets auto removed

ur post most likely got removed by auto-mod's anti filtering on r/sgexams1. iirc  u must meet a minimum quota of200 Words / Charactersin ur post2. there's also a differentiation of academic & non-academic posts on weekdays & weekends  but nt v sure on this subject
u can check with the reddit mods
did u add flair (tags)if not  then it's probably an issue with reddit's end
such stuff happens a lot with the platform nowadays
do know Engineering is not the be-all and end all.It is the soft skills that you learnt along the way. ðŸ˜‚
